attributes.action: create a website similar to this one where people can debate the issues rather than just signing a petition.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If people were allowed to debate the issues raised I think this would help them understand other points of view and lead to a better understanding of the subject. They could then sign if they agree with the proposal.

rejection.details: Comments about the petitions system should be sent to number10@petitions.pm.gov.uk.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
